sentences.english: A Christmas tree was placed in the comer of the brilliant hall. How beautiful it was!
sentences.chinese: 圣诞树放在灯火通明的客厅的一角，实在是太荚了。

sentences.english: And we scheduled it and we get it and my dad and my sister would help trim it.
sentences.chinese: 先做安排然后实践，爸爸和姐姐会帮忙修剪圣诞树。

sentences.english: We've decorated the Christmas tree with plenty of tinsel and baubles.
sentences.chinese: 我们用很多亮亮的东西和小玩意来装饰圣诞树。

sentences.english: It came back down to Earth on a parachute and – fittingly – landed in a Christmas tree plantation near Basingstoke.
sentences.chinese: 巧合的是，它降落在贝辛斯托克附近的一棵圣诞树上。

sentences.english: The image, which measures 200x290 micro-meters, features a Christmas tree, and is etched on a tiny piece of glass.
sentences.chinese: 贺卡上圣诞树的图案是在一小块玻璃上蚀刻而成的。

sentences.english: Christmas tree from a VFW post.
sentences.chinese: 一棵在VFW邮局里的圣诞树。

sentences.english: Handmade Christmas ornaments made for the fans of Angry Birds.
sentences.chinese: 手工制成的圣诞树小挂件，小鸟迷们有福啦。

sentences.english: These \"upside down\" trees were all the rage last year.
sentences.chinese: 这些是去年风靡一时的“倒立”圣诞树。

sentences.english: The Christmas tree was decorated with coloured lights.
Thus began the tradition of the little angel on top of the Christmas tree.
sentences.chinese: 从此，圣诞树顶上的小天便成了一种传统。

sentences.english: The road to the ancient home of the glass Christmas tree bauble is a long and treacherous one.
sentences.chinese: 这条通往玻璃圣诞树古屋的路是一条崎岖而漫长的路。

sentences.english: Companies might bring the same live tree to the same family year after year.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞树租赁公司会每年给他们送去同一棵活树。

sentences.english: One penurious year my parents used a swiss cheese plant.
sentences.chinese: 在经济拮据的一年，我父母曾用绳状藤来代替圣诞树。

sentences.english: The holiday decorations also feature a 6-meter Christmas tree on the building's 94th floor.
sentences.chinese: 在大楼的94层还以6米高的圣诞树作为节日装饰品。

sentences.english: They are ornamenting a Christmas tree.
